description: Explore how non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are revolutionizing education by providing secure, personalized, and learner-centered experiences. Discover the potential of NFTs in credentialing, intellectual property, and gamification, along with overcoming technological, privacy, and legal challenges.
keywords: NFTs, education, blockchain, credentialing, digital certificates, intellectual property, gamification, digital portfolios, lifelong learning, privacy, equity, regulation
title: Revolutionizing Education Through NFTs: A New Horizon
